channel.title: Rics NoteBook
channel.description: Studying the Art of Science & the Science of Art

item.title: Photosynthesis: From Quantum Magic to Plant Mass
item.description: This article delves into the fascinating process of photosynthesis, exploring both its classical understanding and the emerging quantum perspective, revealing how plants transform light into mass at the most fundamental level.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
